subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Auston Matthews, who is expected to be the No. 1 pick in the 2016 N.H.L. draft, had a hat trick to lead the United States to a 7-0 victory over the Czech Republic in the quarterfinals of the world junior hockey championship in Helsinki, Finland.
snippet: Auston Matthews, who is expected to be the No. 1 pick in the 2016 N.H.L. draft, had a hat trick to lead the United States to a 7-0 victory over the Czech Republic in the quarterfinals of the world junior hockey championship in Helsinki, Finland.
